title: incohair Bob Wig,Ash Blonde Wig with Bangs Short Bob Blonde Wig Heat Resistant Synthetic Straight Wigs for Women (11inch,Ash Blonde)
features: Color:Ash Blonde. Kindly note the color will be slightly difference due to the different monitors setting.
Material: high quality synthetic heat resistant fiber, human hair feeling, natural looking. Silky and soft, which is very suitable for long term use.

Wig Cap: average cap size circumference 22.5 inches with 2 adjustable straps inside the cap, which can be linked to a fixed position to adjust the size less or more for about 1-1.5 inches, will fit different head sizes.
Designed for: Cosplay, costume party, carnival, Halloween, concerts,theme parties, weddings, dating, fashionor any other occasion or just for fun.

description: Color:ash blonde. Material:high quality synthetic heat resistant fiber,please keep the heat setting below 150℃. Average cap size: circumference 22.5, allow an adjustment 1-1.5 inches.

Comb your own hair into a bun. Put on a wig cap and let all your hair in, then tighten it. Put on the wig and link the straps to the most comfortable position. Buckle up and brush the wig into the style you love best.

Care and maintain the wig regularly, do not wash it frequently. Smooth and tidy the wig before putting them into water. Wash and care using a little mild shampoo in cold water. Clean cold water to rinse it again and towel to blot up the water. Hang and dry it naturally,avoid the sunlight directly.

The color will be slightly difference due to different monitors setting. The length of our wigs are measured from "crown to end",it will be vary from person to person.The individual's height, neck, head and face measurements can make the length appear longer or shorter. It may slightly shed for the first times wearing, which is normal.
